ModMetaData.name: Alpha Armoury
ModMetaData.author: Sarg Bjornson
ModMetaData.description:
Alpha Armoury expands upon the Unique Weapons system that was introduced in Odyssey:
- Adds around 100 new weapon traits, from the normal to the absolutely bizarre - Adds the possibility of weapon traits modifying the graphic of the unique weapon. Now a rifle with a grenade launcher will look like it has one! - Adds weapon tweaking kits that allow you to modify and change unique weapons - Adds a LOT of mod options to tweak your unique weapon experience.
